sense.gloss: world of go, world of shogi, go circles, shogi circles

sdata.j: ↑若↑↓わか↓い↑棋士↑↓きし↓が↑多少↑↓たしょう↓、↑尊大↑↓そんだい↓な↑感↑↓かん↓じになるのはよくあることで、 そういうことは↑将|棋↑↓しょうぎ↓↑界|↑↓かい↓に↑限↑↓かぎ↓った↑話↑↓はなし↓ではないでしょう。
sdata.e: It often happens that young shogi players become a little self-important, but I don't think that's something limited to the shogi world.
